product.name: Physicians Formula Organic Wear CC Curl + Care Mascara
product.description: The ​1st ever 100% natural mascara with 70% organic ingredients combines the benefits of curl and care for eyelash curler results without the risk of lash loss.  Innovative formula features Physicians Formula's proprietary 100% Natural Origin CurlBooster™ Technology for 2 levels of CC Performance: Curl & Volumize Lashes Condition & Nourish LashesHypoallergenic. Fragrance Free. Gluten Free. Opthalmologist Approved. 100% Free of Harsh Chemicals. 100% Free of Synthetic Preservatives. 100% Free of Parabens. 100% Free of GMO's (Genetically Modified Organisms). 100% Free of Synthetic Colors.
